thread.section_title: Sport Conrad GmbH Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von Sport Conrad GmbH | www.sport-conrad.com
thread.title: Jess Bellamy
thread.title_full: Sport Conrad GmbH bewertet von Jess Bellamy

author: Jess Bellamy
title: Jess Bellamy
text: I ordered a pair of camox freebird skis with mounted touring bindings from Sport Conrad as they were by far the cheapest online. After entering the length of my boots and placing the order, I was subsequently sent an email asking me to confirm the boot length before drilling (always best to check!). The next day I was sent a tracking number for delivery with UPS and the skis arrived in a few days in a sturdy box. The skis were exactly as expected. I was a little concerned about ordering, after reading some negative reviews, but as another user noted people rarely give feedback for good service. Wouldn't hesitate to buy from again.
